shopping.name: Bamboo Toothbrush
shopping.description: A toothbrush made from bamboo, which is a renewable and biodegradable material

shopping.name: Reusable Water Bottle
shopping.description: A water bottle that can be reused multiple times, reducing the need for disposable plastic water bottles.

shopping.name: Cloth Shopping Bag
shopping.description: Reusable shopping bags maded from cotton or other natural fibers, reducing the need for disposable plastic bags.

shopping.name: Plant Based Reusable Containers
shopping.description: 100% recyclable. Govt approved, tested and approved in TUV Rhineland Germany. Easily Portable takeaway containers. Odorless, tasteless and doesn't react with hot food.

wasteManagement.name: Compostable Trash Bags
wasteManagement.description: Trash bags made from buidegradable materials that can be composted instead of ending up in landfills.

wasteManagement.name: Solar-Powered Carger
wasteManagement.description: A charger that harnesses the power of the sub to change electronic devices, reducing the need for electricity from non-renewable sources.

wasteManagement.name: Plant Based Reusable Cups
wasteManagement.description: Cups, that causes no harm to the nature and every batch of cups is unique due to being natural. Odorless tasteless and doesn't react with hot beverages and lightweight.

wasteManagement.name: Reusable Bamboo Straw
wasteManagement.description: 100% Natural, toxic-free, vegan. Odorless, tasteless, washable, resuable and durable. Biodegradable packaging.
